mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, C.COURSE_NO AS COURSE_NAME, USER_NAME, REVIEW_TITLE, TO_CHAR (R.CREATE_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD') AS "CREATE_DATE", R.COUNT AS COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW_COMMENT RC WHERE R.REVIEW_NO = RC.REVIEW_NO) AS COMMENT_COUNT, R.STATUS, REVIEW_STAR, LISTAGG(CHANGE_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY RI.REVIEW_IMG_NO) AS CHANGE_NAME FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = R.USER_NO) JOIN COURSE C ON (R.COURSE_NO = C.COURSE_INDEX) LEFT JOIN REVIEW_IMG RI ON (RI.REVIEW_NO = R.REVIEW_NO) WHERE R.STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY R.REVIEW_NO, C.COURSE_NO, USER_NAME, REVIEW_TITLE, R.CREATE_DATE, R.COUNT, R.STATUS, REVIEW_STAR ORDER BY R.REVIEW_NO DESC

AND R.REVIEW_TITLE
AND C.COURSE_NO

mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT R.REVIEW_NO, C.COURSE_NO AS COURSE_NAME, R.COURSE_NO, USER_NAME, R.USER_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, TO_CHAR (R.CREATE_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD') as "CREATE_DATE", R.COUNT AS COUNT, R.STATUS, REVIEW_STAR FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = R.USER_NO) JOIN COURSE C ON (R.COURSE_NO = C.COURSE_INDEX) WHERE R.REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo} ORDER BY R.REVIEW_NO DESC

SELECT REPLY_NO, REVIEW_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, RC.STATUS AS STATUS, TO_CHAR (RC.CREATE_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD') as "CREATE_DATE", M.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME FROM REVIEW_COMMENT RC JOIN MEMBER M ON (RC.USER_NO = M.USER_NO) WHERE RC.STATUS = 'Y' AND REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo} ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC
